attributes.action: Allow people to grow cannabis for personal use within their own home
attributes.additional_details: So let me get this straight, we can legally kill ourselves with backy/alcohol yet can’t grow a plant that may have multiple medical benefits for personal use? I’m not going to lie, I’m outraged by the Tories approach to cannabis and it’s downright inhumane. If it helps someone, be it just clearing their mind or for a medical reason, they should have the right to grow it and use it in their own home. The current law is unjust! The UK is the largest exporter of cannabis-based medicines in the world. Hypocrisy
attributes.background: The war on drugs is failed, corrupt and generally just stupid, cannabis has been used by humans in written history since at least 3000 BC. Alcohol/tobacco cause millions of deaths and yet they are legal and we can’t grow cannabis for ourselves? .cont below
